title: The Sims 3 - Full Store + Blue River 2016 Repack by SimArchitect
description:
The Sims 3 Full Store + Blue River World

Hi there! Today, March 20 of 2016, I am releasing an ENTIRELY NEW repack of the Full Sims 3 Store that is much faster to run and way easier to install!

Just copy two folders and you are done!! No need to run the launcher!!!

You can see how I did it in my video @YouTube:


Enjoy!!!

PS: I added, as a bonus, Blue River, a huge world I created for the game, with hundreds of lots (it's an Alpha release, but you can play with it) and also a couple (very few) special custom content that I used with it, like rugs that can be used as rabbit holes, a nice ladder that only takes one square and a ramp for your cars or disabled sims!!
